post.author: 이진경
post.content:
The Toronto Sun/Sun Media Corporation is presently seeking a 12 to 15 month contract position for

Programmer/Analyst

Sucessful candidate should be a post-secondary graduate in Computer Science with at least 3-5 years experience in a corporate environment. The candidate should have strong VMS,VAX-BASIC/ALPHA-BASIC, RMS programming experience under either a VAX or ALPHA platform.

Only qualified candidates will be contacted.
Additional Information
Salary: CAD 60,000.00 to CAD 74,000.00 per year
Position Type: Full Time, Contract  

Contact Information
John Lam
softjobs@sunpub.com
Sun Media Corp.
333 King Street East
Toronto ON M5A3X5
Ph: 416-947-2222
Fax: 416-947-2439
post.title: GTA-VMS Programmer/Analyst
